page.title: 17SURVEY WORK IN RYTON
page.content:
Out of a class of{30}seven/eight year olds:- {2}pupils had lived in Coventry. {22}were born in the village.
{3}had{no car}in the family. {12}had{1 car}in the family. {15}had{2 cars}in the family.
{14}had a{video recorder}at home. {9}had a{computer}at home. {4}had{both}at home. After school they did:- Swimming.........7 Horseriding....6 Dancing classes..4 Karate.........2 Brownies.........9 Cubs...........1 Piano lessons....2 12 went with parents to the{Conexion, a Club-Sports complex on the edge of the village. It is linked to the {Cov.City Football Club}Training area. Formerly the "Sky Blue Conexion".
